S08n683:1: atha tā devatā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ sarvāṃśca bodhisattvāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ sthitāḥ abhūvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ samantratantrakalpavistarāṇi ca |
S08n683:2: bhāṣante sma svamudrāṇāṃ cauṣadhyo yathābhimataṃ bhāṣante sma |
S08n683:3: anujñātā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena sattvānāmarthāya sarvamudrāmantrapaṭalavisaraṃ bhāṣate sma svakaṃ svakaṃ mudrāpaṭalamoṣadhīnāṃ ca kalpaṃ bhāṣante sma ||
S08n683:4: tumburuḥ sārthavāho evamāha - “ādau tāvad gandhena hastāvudvartya candanamiśreṇa vānyairvā sugandhajātibhirdevīnāmagrataḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitvodaṅmukho vā vāmahastena dakṣiṇahastāṅguṣṭhaṃ muṣṭiyogena gṛhītvā avasavyena bhrāmayitvā nābhideśe sthāpayet |
S08n683:6: eṣa bhagavaṃ ! tumbureḥ sārthavāhasya samayamudrā mama |
S08n683:7: tadeva hastau karmārthasādhakā vāmahastenāṅguṣṭhamabhyantare prakṣipya dṛḍhaṃ pragṛhya muṣṭiyogena nābhideśe nyaset |
S08n683:8: eṣa bhagavaṃ ! mama jayāyā mudrā sarvakarmakarā |
S08n683:11: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ dvitīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya paścimāṃ diśi māvarjayet |
S08n683:12: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ sarvaduṣṭā nāgāṃ stambhayati nirviṣīkaraṇe ca prayoktavyaḥ |
S08n683:13: tṛtīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya uttarāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet sarvayakṣayakṣīkinnaramahoragakūṣmāṇḍāśca vaśyā bhavanti |
S08n683:17: caturthamaṅguliṃ vikāsya abhyantarasthitamaṅguṣṭhaṃ saṅkocya hastatale pūrvāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet |
S08n683:23: dvau hastau saṃyamya sarvamaṅguliṃ vikāsya añjalyākāreṇa mūrdhanyāspṛśet |
S08n683:29: etadeva bhagavaṃ ! pañca mahāmudrā sarvakāmaphalapradā bhavatī” ti ||
S08n683:30: vijayāṃ evamāha - “pañca eva bhagavaṃ ! mama mahāmudrā bhavanti |
S08n683:31: vāmahastenāṅguṣṭhābhyantaraṃ kṛtvā yathā nakhā na dṛśyante tathā kāryaṃ dṛḍhaṃ muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā prahāramārjanayogenādhaḥ avalokayet |
S08n683:36: eta eva pañcamahāmudrā sarvakāmaphalapradā bhavanti” iti ||
S08n683:37: ajitā evamāha - “ubhau hastau saṃyamya ubhau aṅguṣṭhamadhye prakṣipya suṣirañjalyākāraṃ kṛtvā madhyamāṅgulisūcikau kanyasāṅgulimucchritau pāśākāraṃ kṛtvā tarjanyau tathaiva cānāmikāvavaṣṭabhya ajitā nāma mahāmudrā bhavati |
S08n683:47: eta eva pañcamahāmudrāḥ sarvāśāpāripūrakā bhavanti iti ||
S08n683:48: aparājitā evamāha - “pañca eva bhagavaṃ mama mahāmudrā bhavanti |
S08n683:50: tenaiva vidhinā yathā sādhane'smiṃ tathā yojyāḥ |
S08n683:51: dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ sthitvā devīnāmagrataḥ ubhau hastau saṃśliṣya madhyamānāmikātarjanyādibhiḥ trisūcyākāraṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā kaniṣṭhikāṅgulimadhyamaṅguṣṭhau ca madhye prakṣipya hastatale'smiṃ mūrdhni sthāne tadā nyaset |
S08n683:52: prathamaṃ mahāmudraḥ aparājitā nāma evaṃ sarve prayoktavyāḥ |
S08n683:54: yannāmikā bhaginyaḥ bhrātṛsahitāḥ tannāmakāḥ sarveṣāṃ mahāmudrā bhavanti |
S08n683:56: yadetadaṅguṣṭhaṃ yad bhrātustumburoḥ yadetadaṅgulyaḥ sarve bhaginyaḥ anupūrvasaṃjñakāḥ |
S08n683:57: tarjanī jayā madhyamā vijayā anāmikā ajitā kanyasā aparājitā |
S08n683:63: tumburuḥ sārthavāha evamāha - “atheṣāṃ sāmānyataḥ agadābhidhānaṃ bhavati |
S08n683:64: asmākaṃ ca oṣadhīnāṃ prabhāvo yena vaśyā bhavanti sarvabhūtāḥ |
S08n683:66: aśvatthanyagrodhaśuṅgāṃ gṛhītvā kṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā gokṣīreṇāloḍya sitapakṣe aśvininakṣatreṇa induvāre tithau saptamyāṃ pūrvāhne ṛtumatyāḥ striyāyā aprasavanadharminyāḥ sārthavāhamantreṇa parijapya saptavārāṃ tathaiva mudrāṃ badhvā pāyayet pūrvābhimukhāṃ kṛtvā nārī garbhaṃ graheṣyate |
S08n683:67: putraṃ janayate dīrghāyuṣyaṃ supatinā ca saha svaptavyam |
S08n683:68: teṣāmeva mūlaṃ gṛhītvā mūlanakṣatreṇottarāyāṃ diśi gatāyāṃ śilāyāmādityavāreṇa sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
S08n683:69: yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati āhārapānabhojanādiṣu gandhamālyatāmbulādiṣu prayoktavyam |
S08n683:72: tadeva śuṅgau tenaiva vidhinā yathā striyā tathātmanā pibet |
S08n683:75: gorjarukaḥ śatapādī vā naraśakraphalāni tathaiva cūrṇamidaṃ payasā saha peyaṃ yasya gṛhe pramadāśatamasti |
S08n683:76: evamanena prakāreṇa pūrvamūlāṃ svamudrāṃ mantreṇopetāḥ varjayitvā viṣamupaviṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ yojyam |
S08n683:77: sarvakarmiṣu ca sarvabhūtānāṃ vaśīkaraṇamuttamaṃ sādhanīyāśce” ti ||
S08n683:78: jayā evamāha - “jayantīmūlaṃ gṛhya tathaiva karttavyaṃ yathā tumbureḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayati |
S08n683:80: jayantīmūlaṃ tṛlohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā puṣyayogena somavāreṇa śuklapakṣasaptamyāṃ sapūrṇamāsyāṃ caturdaśyāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitena śucinā kuṅkumamiśraṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣeptavyāḥ |
S08n683:82: svamantraṃ akṣaralakṣaṃ japtvā guḍikāṃ prakṣipya candragrahe mukte vidyādharo bhavati kāmarūpī yatheṣṭagatiḥ viṃśativarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati |
S08n683:84: mānuṣe punaḥ evaṃ sarvakarmāṇi karotī” ti ||
S08n683:86: agastivandākaṃ gṛhya jyeṣṭhodakena divyavāriṇā vā piṣṭvā svamantreṇābhimantrya pādau mrakṣayedyojanaśataṃ gamanāgamanaṃ karoti |
S08n683:92: aparājitā evamāhaṃ - “aparājitāmūlaṃ gṛhya śuklakṛṣṇau sapatraphalamūlau sarvaṃ tathaiva kartavyaṃ yathā sārthavāhasyeti |
S08n683:95: putrañjarī kṛtāñjalī sahā ca sahadevā ca mahoṣadhī |
S08n683:103: akṣamātraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā guṭikāṃ vaktre tuṃ tāṃ nyaset ||
S08n683:108: udgīṇe tathā yuktiḥ svadehī bhavati jāpadhīḥ |
S08n683:109: anyathā yadi vaktrasthā viśvarūpā bhavet sadā ||
S08n683:111: anyathā hṛyate guṭikā yadi rakṣāṃ na karoti jāpī ||
S08n683:121: kurvanti ca sadā martyā tadā teṣāṃ niyojayet ||
S08n683:124: kathitaṃ kathayiṣyanti ye cānye bhuvi mānavāḥ |
S08n683:125: tat sarvaṃ kalpavisaraṃ iha coktaṃ lokamātaraiḥ ||
S08n683:129: adhiṣṭhānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ aśeṣāṇāṃ ca jinātmajām ||
S08n683:133: sādhu sādhu tataḥ kanya samaye tiṣṭhadhva yatnatāmiti ||
S08n683:134: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt saptacatvāriṃśatimaḥ paṭalavisarāt tṛtīyaḥ catuḥkumāryopayikasarvasādhanajapaniyamamudrāoṣadhitantramantrasarvakarmapaṭalavisaraṃ parisamāpta iti ||
